topic.title: Site cloning?
topic.body:
Cloning sites is great. Killer feature, if you ask me. Still, I do have a few questions about that.

1) Is there any way to specify a site is clone-able or not? In ZeroHello, some sites' menu display the "clone" entry, others don't. What's the rationale, here?
2) Is there a way to change the way a cloned site looks on ZeroHello? Its name/description, basically?

Thanks guys.

topic.title: ZeroFrame API from plain old JS?
topic.body:
Hey guys.

Just wondering, is it possible (and if so, how) to call Zeroframe commands from non-coffeescript code? For instance, I'm trying to get some JSON files from my ZeroSite. On a non-Zero version of it, I just $.getJSON() it, but CORS prevents me to do it on ZeroNet, right? Anyway, I thought of using fileGet instead, but I can't get it to work without CoffeeScript...

Thanks :)
